1010011011111101 0001011101101001 0 -> sum: 1011111001100110, cout: 0
0000000101011000 1110010011111111 0 -> sum: 1110011001010111, cout: 0

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
